title: Create a brand record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Plan > Company > Brands.

  2. Click New.

  3. In the New Brand dialog box, provide all requested information.

    Field Description
    Display label How the brand is displayed in Service Management.
    Owner

    Owner of the brand.

    The brand is displayed in the Brands section of General tab of the company record for the owner.
    Description A description of the brand.
    Logo The brand's logo. Click Upload image to upload the logo image.

  4. Click Save.

Related topics

  • Brands
  • How to edit a brand record
  • How to retire a brand record
